text: 4:2 1 Korin 1:18; 2 Korin 2:17; 6:4; 6:7; 1 Tesalonika 2:3-5E aghumsɨzir arazir gumazamiziba mogava amiba, e akɨrim ragha dagh asara. E ifavarir arazibagh amir puvatɨ. Egha e Godɨn akam gɨrazɨ, a igharagha otozir puvatɨ. E Godɨn guizɨn akam azenarama anekuri, eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar uan navir averiabar aven en araziba tuisɨgham. Egh me kamaghɨn fogham, e ingangarir bar aghuim Godɨn damazimɨn a gami.
